private_information: I can move disks A, B, C, D only
I can move only the top disk of any peg at any time
I must follow Tower of Hanoi rules: only one disk moved at a time and a larger disk cannot be placed on a smaller disk
agent_1.goal: Help achieve the global goal by proposing the sequence of primitive moves that involve disks A, B, C, D while respecting the rules and agent restrictions

private_information: I can move disks E, F, G only
I can move only the top disk of any peg at any time
I must follow Tower of Hanoi rules: only one disk moved at a time and a larger disk cannot be placed on a smaller disk
agent_2.goal: Contribute moves for disks E, F, G if needed while respecting the rules and agent restrictions

private_information: I can move disks H, I, J only
I can move only the top disk of any peg at any time
I must follow Tower of Hanoi rules: only one disk moved at a time and a larger disk cannot be placed on a smaller disk
agent_3.goal: Contribute moves for disks H, I, J if needed while respecting the rules and agent restrictions

private_information: I coordinate the agents to produce a single coherent plan
I will integrate agents' proposed moves, resolve conflicts, and produce a final PDDL domain and problem targeting the FastDownward solver
orchestrator.goal: Produce a final validated plan and a PDDL domain and problem for the FastDownward solver that achieves the global goal

public_information: This is a Tower of Hanoi instance with three pegs named left, middle, and right
There are 10 disks labeled A through J with A smallest and J largest
Only the top disk of a peg can be moved at a time and a larger disk cannot be placed on a smaller disk
Agents are restricted to move only their assigned disks
The global goal is to end with disk C on the right peg and all other disks in the specified left configuration while preserving the order constraints
final_move_sequence: agent_1: move disk A from left to right
agent_1: move disk B from left to middle
agent_1: move disk A from right to middle
agent_1: move disk C from left to right
agent_1: move disk A from middle to right
agent_1: move disk B from middle to left
agent_1: move disk A from right to left

propose_moves.system_prompt: You are agent_1 and you can move disks A B C D. Propose a sequence of primitive moves that involve only disks you are allowed to move. Provide moves in the exact format 'agent_1: move disk X from pegY to pegZ'. Do not emit PDDL. Respect Tower of Hanoi rules and the public information.
propose_moves.prompt: Your name is agent_1. You are in an environment with the following public information: {environment->public_information} You have the following private information: {agents->agent_1->private_information} This is the global goal: {agents->agent_1->goal} Provide a list of primitive moves that concern only the disks you can move. Use the exact format 'agent_1: move disk X from pegY to pegZ'. Do not assume additional capabilities.

propose_moves.system_prompt: You are agent_2 and you can move disks E F G. Propose a sequence of primitive moves that involve only disks you are allowed to move. Provide moves in the exact format 'agent_2: move disk X from pegY to pegZ'. Do not emit PDDL. Respect Tower of Hanoi rules and the public information.
propose_moves.prompt: Your name is agent_2. You are in an environment with the following public information: {environment->public_information} You have the following private information: {agents->agent_2->private_information} This is the global goal: {agents->agent_2->goal} Provide a list of primitive moves that concern only the disks you can move. Use the exact format 'agent_2: move disk X from pegY to pegZ'. Do not assume additional capabilities.

propose_moves.system_prompt: You are agent_3 and you can move disks H I J. Propose a sequence of primitive moves that involve only disks you are allowed to move. Provide moves in the exact format 'agent_3: move disk X from pegY to pegZ'. Do not emit PDDL. Respect Tower of Hanoi rules and the public information.
propose_moves.prompt: Your name is agent_3. You are in an environment with the following public information: {environment->public_information} You have the following private information: {agents->agent_3->private_information} This is the global goal: {agents->agent_3->goal} Provide a list of primitive moves that concern only the disks you can move. Use the exact format 'agent_3: move disk X from pegY to pegZ'. Do not assume additional capabilities.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert orchestrator for multi-agent planning and PDDL. Integrate the agents' proposed primitive moves into a coherent plan, resolve conflicts, and produce a final PDDL domain and problem targeted for the FastDownward planner. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags. Keep actions belonging to different agents distinct and preserve the primitive move ordering. Also output a final ordered list of primitive moves in the format 'agent_i: move disk X from pegY to pegZ'.
pddl.prompt: You are the orchestrator. You will receive proposed move lists from agents. Integrate these proposals to achieve the global goal: move disk C to the right peg while ending with the specified left configuration, obeying Tower of Hanoi rules and agent movement restrictions. Inputs: {moves_agent_1} {moves_agent_2} {moves_agent_3} Produce a final validated plan, a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem targeting the FastDownward solver. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags. Also output the final ordered list of primitive moves in the format 'agent_i: move disk X from pegY to pegZ'.
